name: Inquisitor Shamael
aura: Increases Ally ACC in Doom Tower battles by 60.

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of decreasing the duration of a random buff on the target by 1 turn. Counterattacks with this skill each time an enemy places a debuff on an ally. These counterattacks will only deal 50% of the normal damage and cannot be critical.

Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Will ignore 25% of the target’s DEF. Will ignore further 25% of the target’s DEF for each buff on this Champion. Places a [True Fear] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn if this attack kills an enemy.

Each critical hit fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 7.5%. Whenever an ally receives a [Fear] or [True Fear] debuff, this skill will instantly remove the debuff and fill the ally’s Turn Meter by 15%.
